data.title: OZONE: "The Two Mrs. Carrolls" (Humphrey Bogart, Barbara Stanwyck, Alexis Smith).
data.meta_description: "The Two Mrs. Carrolls" is a dramatic mixture of love and terror. It tells the story of a man whose love is so intense that it brings horror to two ...
data.text:
"The Two Mrs. 'Carrolls" is a drama-,

tic mixture of love and terror. It tells

the. story of a man whose love is so

intense that it brings horror to two

women and eventually involves him in

a series of bizarre and frightening

situations.

As Geoffrey Carroll, Bogart, playing

a completely different type of role, is

stated to give an excellent perform

ance. Miss Stanwyck, as the second

Mrs. Carroll, is equally good, and Miss

Smith (the "other woman") is calm .

and cool in her characterisation.

Other members of the cast, including

Nigel Bruce, Isobel Elsom, . Pat

O'Moore, and Ann' Carter, lend stature

to the film's all-round quality.
